objects.text:
• Premium Creamy Long-Lasting Formula
• Matched Pink Powder Blush
• Built-in Mirror for Touch-ups
• Professional-Grade Pigmentation

product_details.name: Pink Perfect Duo: Luxe Lipstick & Blush Compact Set
product_details.description:
• Premium pink-toned lipstick with creamy, long-lasting formula
• Elegant silver and black lipstick packaging for sophisticated look
• Perfectly matched pink powder blush in sleek compact case
• Built-in mirror for on-the-go touch-ups
• Professional-grade pigmentation for vibrant color payoff
• Complementary shades designed to enhance natural beauty
• Travel-friendly compact size
• Mirror-finish compact case with secure closure
• Dermatologically tested formulation
• Perfect for creating a coordinated makeup look

banner_details:
This banner design features a modern and vibrant promotional layout with a strong feminine appeal, suited for beauty product marketing. The background is constructed with soft pink gradients and circular graphic elements, giving the composition a layered and dynamic feel. The heading (`heading`) is bold and dark-toned, providing strong contrast atop a light pink strip. Below it, the subheading (`subheading`) uses a magenta hue to emphasize the featured product: a cosmetics set. Informational bullet points are listed in a light grey (`description`) font. A callout line (`tagline`) highlights a special offer in vivid magenta. The price (`price`) is showcased in bold font with a currency icon, and a solid magenta button (`cta_button`) contains the call-to-action text (`cta`). To the right, the focus product image (`product_image`) balances the textual and visual elements effectively.

**Color Palette:**
- Soft pink: `#FFF5F8`
- Light blush: `#FFE0EB`
- Vibrant pink: `#FF6699`
- Magenta: `#D62E83`
- Pale rose: `#FF8EB4`
- Dark grey: `#333333`
- White: `#FFFFFF`
product_color: The product image showcases a vibrant pink lipstick and matching blush palette, balanced elegantly with sleek black and silver casing. The primary color, a bright candy pink (#F48BB1), is used in both the lipstick and blush, creating a cohesive visual appeal. The black casing (#1C1C1C) provides a bold contrast, which helps highlight the vibrant pink. The silver metallic section of the lipstick holder (#C0C0C0) adds a modern, polished touch. The blending of bright pink against the neutral black and silver emphasizes the product while maintaining sophistication. This palette is perfect for banners targeting a youthful, chic, and stylish demographic.
